channel.title: Community Members?
channel.description: How do you get to be a community member? just wondering

item.title: Community Members?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote="`Lewk_, post:26, topic:313967"][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=410451.msg3031119#msg3031119 date=1258402960]
They think they are so smart, sometimes they tick me off. They think they are so much better then everyone else and brag a lot. You try to add something and you end up deleting it because you get flamed for it. I thought the point of the forum was to learn, and yet they seem to think begginers need to “fuck off.”

They scare new people away before they can learn anything with the forum.
[/quote]
Not really. Approach them in the right way and some of them can be really nice.[/quote]
Really? It’s hard to find the nice one… I have this one idiot named abraham1### that just goes wherever I post and says “You do not have the right to post”

And sends me retarded PMs…

Read full topic

item.title: Community Members?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“B2300 T4nk, post:13, topic:313967”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=410451.msg3030554#msg3030554 date=1258338104]

I thought you needed 50 rep on both forums? Well that’s what I heard a while ago… and then I saw people that had like 57rep on MITB and like 15 rep here and I was like wtf?

They probably just changed it because community members don’t have anything to do with MoparScape.

Then how are you a “community” member? You’re just a MITB member then…

Community member was a term coined at the kaitnieks.com forum, and then carried over to the moparisthebest.com forums well before the moparisthebest.com forums were even a thought. So I wasn’t going to change the name that had been around for years.

To answer the question though, you need to get 50 rep points on the moparisthebest.com forums. You would do this by contributing, helping, writing good programs and sharing them open source with others.
[/quote]But they hate our guts, why would they rep?[/quote]

They don’t hate your guts. They only hate it when people come from over here and since they threw together some awful code for a private server think they know everything about programming and try to sound smart or teach people about it.

Read full topic

I thought you needed 50 rep on both forums? Well that’s what I heard a while ago… and then I saw people that had like 57rep on MITB and like 15 rep here and I was like wtf?

They probably just changed it because community members don’t have anything to do with MoparScape.
[/quote]
Then how are you a “community” member? You’re just a MITB member then…[/quote]

Community member was a term coined at the kaitnieks.com forum, and then carried over to the moparisthebest.com forums well before the moparisthebest.com forums were even a thought. So I wasn’t going to change the name that had been around for years.

To answer the question though, you need to get 50 rep points on the moparisthebest.com forums. You would do this by contributing, helping, writing good programs and sharing them open source with others.
